nodes.title: Project Manager

nodes.content:
• Managed Web Development Projects: Led project teams through entire project lifecycle; Defined project objectives, requirements and milestones; Identified, tracked, managed, and resolved project and client issues; Tracked, analyzed and reported project goals, progress and results; Prepared progress reports and led weekly team meetings
  • Developed Comprehensive Specifications: Created and refined comprehensive site maps, wireframes, functional specifications and technical specifications; Managed Creative Department
nodes.title: Project Manager

nodes.content:
• Managed and Produced Web Projects For External Clients: Met with clients to derive requirements, communicated client requirements to creative and technical team; Developed schedules and budgets, Managed client relationships and expectations; Managed project teams
  • Developed Project Specifications: Created and refined site maps, wireframes, user interface specifications and prototypes
  • Prepared Pitches and Proposals
